suggestions.title: git: Add click with modifier to set default for side-by-side diff toolbar buttons
agent_ui: Fix keybinding display inside tooltips in the footer actions
git: Standardize nomenclature for side-by-side diff
git: Enable the split diff for everyone
Fix terminal pane showing welcome screen during loading
languages: Fix local path of JSON and YAML schemas
repl: List python environments first
cli: Use Terminal Panels window for zed --add
python: Fix windows backslash path handling in python toolchain detection
Enable type on search by default for the project search
Add agent worktree directory setting + worktree info persistence
Support LSP document symbols in breadcrumbs and outline UI
Swap `agent.single_file_review`'s default value to false
Use document symbols' ranges to derive their outline labels
agent_ui: Tone down thinking icon button
vim: Make `:bdelete` use new `workspace::CloseItemInAllPanes` command
search: Support brace syntax in project search include/exclude patterns
settings: Add ability to select audio input/output devices for collab
agent: Check is_error flag in MCP tool responses
Add user picked model to be used as a default for open router provider when generating comments and thread summary
bedrock: Enable 1M context window
json_schema_store: Include available LSP adapters in settings schema
Fix VSCode tasks.json parsing for tasks without explicit labels
languages: Add runnable support for bash
Allow changing the context window size for Ollama
git_graph: Add basic keyboard navigation
Preserve panel zoom state across workspace switches
git_ui: Open commit list from Git panel and commit diff from Git Graph rows
repl: Initial stdin support for kernels
Fix Conda activation error appearing during task execution
language_models: Add image support for Bedrock
workspace: Enable adding a recent project to current workspace from modal
agent_ui: Fix max tokens error not being shown
